notes: pronominal verb; compound tenses use essere
example_sentence_italian: Accorgersi dei propri errori è il primo passo per migliorare.
example_sentence_english: To realize one's own mistakes is the first step toward improving.

translation_english: he was noticing/she was noticing/you (formal) were noticing
he has noticed/she has noticed/you (formal) have noticed; he has realized/she has realized/you (formal) have realized
notes: used with auxiliary essere; pronominal; also used as formal Lei

translation_english: he has noticed/she has noticed/you (formal) have noticed; he has realized/she has realized/you (formal) have realized
notes: used with auxiliary essere; pronominal; also used as formal Lei
